statements: UPDATE chatbot_training_data SET output_text='I understand', input_text='Hello' WHERE training_id=1;

UPDATE chatbot_training_data SET output_text = 'Hello!' WHERE training_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_training_data SET input_text = 'Good morning' WHERE training_timestamp = '2022-02-20 08:00:00';
UPDATE chatbot_training_data SET question='How are you?' WHERE user_id=123
UPDATE chatbot_metadata SET accuracy=0.95, deployment_status=true WHERE model_version=2
UPDATE chatbot_training_data SET answer='I am sorry, I cannot answer that.' WHERE user_id=101
UPDATE chatbot_metadata SET deployment_status=TRUE, accuracy=0.95 WHERE model_version=2
UPDATE training_data SET message_text = 'New message 1' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE bot_responses SET confidence = 0.9, response_text = 'Updated response 2' WHERE response_id = 2;
UPDATE training_data SET entity = 'Organization' WHERE message_id = 1001;
UPDATE bot_responses SET confidence = 0.95, intent = 'Greeting' WHERE response_id = 2002;
UPDATE chatbot_training_data SET answer='New response' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE deployed_models SET active=TRUE, version='v2.0' WHERE model_name='Model ABC';
UPDATE chatbot_training_data SET answer = 'Updated answer', category = 'General' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_feedback SET rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Great feedback!' WHERE question_id = 3;
UPDATE training_data SET confidence = 0.89 WHERE message_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', total_messages_sent = 1000 WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE intent_mapping SET intent_name = 'new_intent', related_intents = '{"intent1": 0.8, "intent2": 0.7}', examples = ['example1', 'example2'] WHERE intent_id = 456;
